name: Hilton Garden Inn Tulsa Airport

reviews.text: This hotel is undergoing some renovations. Our room needed some paint and the beds were somewhat uncomfortable. The continental breakfast was OK but lacked nonfat milk, juices other than OJ, and more bread options. In addition, the pool & spa were closed.
reviews.title: Below average for a Hilton Garden Inn

reviews.text: Convenient to Tulsa airport. I left the hotel one hour before my flight was scheduled to leave. I dropped off my rental, went through ticketing and security and still had plenty of time to spare. Not too bad.
reviews.title: Very good airport hotel

reviews.text: The rooms are clean and well appointed. Mine also had a mini-fridge and microwave. Not sure if that's standard.
reviews.title: A Very Good Airport Hotel
Very nice hotel near Tulsa Int'l
reviews.text: Didn't stay there long, but was very pleased with my brief stay.

reviews.title: Very Nice Hotel
reviews.text: I was very impressed with this hotel. I stayed two nights while in town to attend a funeral. My room was a nice size, and extremely clean which is all that really matters to me. The staff was friendly and accomodating. I would recommend this hotel to any business traveler. The room rate was very reasonable. By airport hotel standards, the Hilton Garden is well above average.

reviews.title: Great location for an early morning flight
reviews.text: This hotel is incredibly convenient to the airport which was exactly what I needed. Its a fairly typical Garden Inn, but not quite as nice as some. Its a little older and some of the amenities often at HGI's are missing. The bed is comfy and the room is spacious and well equipped. The lighting is not great, to the point that makeup application is a bit tricky. Check in was fast and friendly. Nothing wrong with the place and you will enjoy your stay. Still, just not quite on the same level as other Hilton Garden Inns. I would stay here again to catch an early morning flight, but I would not stay here if I needed a hotel for more than one night.

reviews.title: Good Spacious Rooms
reviews.text: Good Rooms
Spacious and Nice TV
reviews.title: excellent service

reviews.text: Also food is good but have to pay for that it is not complimentory
reviews.title: Manager made insulting remarks to guest

reviews.text: Clean rooms, new beds, very helpful staff. There was a problem with my TV, fixed same day I reported it and they gave me a free meal in the hotel restaurant for my troubles. Everyone I dealt with at the hotel was friendly and helpful - directions to local places to eat, check in, business center support. Will be staying there when I come back for a training conference in 2010.
reviews.title: Not great, but good

likes.liked: — Close to the airport and on-site restaurant
likes.disliked: — Upstairs noise, and breakfast was not kept hot

reviews.text: As I travel about, HGIs are my chain hotel of choice, but not this one. It is the rattiest HGI I've ever seen. Lower quality bath fixtures/furniture than most; worn; needs paint, new tiles, etc. Great staff; excellent location if you have an early flight; otherwise, you have better choices.
reviews.title: Needs an update

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: To walk into the Hilton Garden Inn, you will find it to be one of the best appointed anywhere. The lobby is comfortable and well firnished, the restaurant is right there and the decor is warm.
reviews.title: Excellent...but

reviews.text: The room is much like every Garden Inn, so we were looking forward to a restful night's sleep in advance of our flight early the next morning. We were in room #350, and it was very cozy.
reviews.title: Good service ... but beaten up property

reviews.text: Unfortunately, the AC system was so loud we could not sleep. Like many people, we find it hard to sleep with complete silence, so we had the AC fan running. That was fine until the cooling kicked in. It rattled and made so much noise our sleep was ruined.
reviews.title: If you want sleep, stay in Downtown Tulsa... would have been worth the morning drive

reviews.text: The hotel is very beaten up -- in the rooms, the ceiling looks like it has been partly patched and there are cracks everywhere. The property needs a facelift/refresh.
reviews.title: Starting to show its age.
Typical Hilton Garden
reviews.text: Its always the same, friendly staff and clean room. Nothing special but a good place to stay when your flight is at 6am. Have two stays booked next month.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Next to the Airport, clean nice beds, great shower, good Breakfast for and 2 min. from the check in. You will not go wrong if you are flying out of Tulsa and do not want to wake up at 5am to catch an early flight.
reviews.title: Great for the place and price
Good Airport Hotel
reviews.text: Decent airport hotel. Let me check in early, all service from employees I received was very good. The room was nice - good sized and with all the tools I need to work. The hallways were a bit dirty (used Q-tip in the same place in the hall for both days I was there) and the outdoor areas looked like they weren't cleaned that often - but the actual room was clean. Pretty good cafe - which is nice, there aren't many eating choices around. Airport is close enough to walk to - but the shuttle was efficient (I walked back after returning a rental car one day).

reviews.title: Very fair at the airport
reviews.text: This hotel, recently decorated, is in much better condition than it was before. The rooms are large and well appointed.

There is an in-house restaurant but it's not very good (including for breakfast). There is little in the area around the airport but there is one good seafood restaurant, White River Fish Market (1708 North Sheridan), a short distance from the hotel.
reviews.title: Nice Airport Hotel

aka: Hilton Garden Inn Tulsa Airport Hotel
description: The Hilton Garden Inn Tulsa Airport hotel is located at the main entrance of Tulsa International Airport (TUL). Take advantage of our complimentary airport shuttle service. Explore new species of mammals, reptiles and birds at Tulsa Zoo, or enjoy a round of golf at the Mohawk Park golf course. Find bargains at one of many nearby shopping malls. Stay in a spacious guest room at this Tulsa hotel and enjoy thoughtful amenities, including a mini-refrigerator and a 32-inch LCD HDTV.
